name: moonbase-escape
notes: LordVaderUK's Moonbase Escape, as converted to PunyInform by Jeremy (EdwardianDuck). Jeremy also supplied the walkthrough. See https://stardot.org.uk/forums/viewtopic.php?p=426724#p426724.

name: calypso

name: advent
notes: PunyInform Advent, by Crowther & Woods. Source code available at if-archive.
walkthrough: drop nugget, diamonds, keys and chest
drop jewelry, coins, rug, pillow and emerald

drop vase, pearl, trident, bars and pyramid
